roleset.name: explore, discover new places or things, searching out new places
roleset.note: EXPLORE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls investigate-35.4. (from explore.01-v)
EXPLORATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from exploration.01-n)

example.name: exploring options
example.text: The action followed by one day an Intelogic announcement that it will retain [an investment banker]-1 *trace*-1 to explore alternatives ``to maximize shareholder value,'' including the possible sale of the company.
example.arg: alternatives ``to maximize shareholder value,'' including the possible sale of the company
